author: erodriguez
msg: Corrected reference identifier encoding behavior and updated encoder to take injected ByteBuffer.

author: stas
msg: add a perl bug workaround: with USE_ITHREADS perl leaks pthread_key_t
on every reload of libperl.{a,so} (it's allocated on the very first
perl_alloc() and never freed). This becomes a problem on apache
restart: if the OS limit is 1024, 1024 restarts later things will

author: joes
msg: destructor calls, otherwise they leak ~ 8K per instance.
This bug only impacts the cgi and test environments.
